name: Cyberblade
note: Combining all effects allows you to move onto a square and whack 2 people; or whack somebody, move, and whack somebody else; or whack 2 people and then move.

baseEffect.name: Basic effect
baseEffect.description: Deal 2 damage to 1 target on your square.

firstExtraEffect.name: Shadow Step
firstExtraEffect.description: Move 1 square before or after the basic effect.

secondExtraEffect.name: Slice and Dice
secondExtraEffect.description: Deal 2 damage to a different target on your square. The shadowstep may be used before or after this effect.
